data.title: Good food
data.text: I was there for a family gathering in the restaurant and was pleasantly surprised. The food was very good as was the service. The restaurant is separate from the casino and I wasn't bothered by cigarette smoke.

data.title: Typical theme
data.text:
Went here for a late breakfast. Bartender was my server, and she was way more interested in getting drinks out to the players than she was in interacting with me.
She was hustling for her servers, but all the people at the counter got less than ideal service.
Food was really boring; the menu has in-depth descriptions, but the results don't match up.
Thankfully I went on a Wednesday, when all their whiskeys are $5 a shot. Only redeeming quality of my visit, and the only day I'd go back there.

data.title: Great food and awesome service.
data.text:
The "Black Pearl" is a great place to meet and catch up with friends, have a quick bite to eat or sit down and have a proper lunch, dinner or even breakfast. The food served at the pearl is also delicious. The waiters are quick, friendly and have a good attitude. I had no problems at all finding a seat, ordering or receiving my bill. 
Will definitely be coming back.

data.title: Easy, fast and good
data.text: The waiters were nice, the food was quick and is very good considering that it was busy, I would definitely go back there!

data.title: Appetizers ok
data.text: I went in for some appetizers after work. They are a bit pricey for what you get. Would be better to charge a bit more and give a larger portion. They did not seem to be busy and I had to ask twice for a refill.

data.title: Joke establishment..bad food, horrible service
data.text: Place is horrific...slowest drink service in history of planet earth...food is bad...atmosphere sucks...place is very stuffy...people there look like they were born to gamble and will die there...table games are rigged...should be shut down

data.title: Great gathering with friends for fellowship and fun and good food!
data.text: I love going to the Black Pearl, the food is fresh, hot and tasty.  They have good appetizers and have never had a bad meal there!  Always good food!

data.title: Limited menu but excellent!
data.text:
Very nice surprise. 

Food was first class. 

Burger special was one of the best in the area. 

Sweet potato fries were very delicious and seasoned perfectly. 

Nice selection of sides. 

Very clean inside and nicer than expected. 

Service was attentive and very friendly. 

Great find.

data.title: Best Chicken Caesar Salad ever!
data.text: Okay I know it may not seem like much but you can really mess up a Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad and so when I order one it is with mediocre expectations.  I have to say that this was the absolute best Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad that I have ever had.  Also, if you want to do a little gambling then you have that option, as well.  However, back to the salad.  I will definitely come back here just for the salad!!!!

data.title: Great food
data.text:
This is also a casino..so the food was excellent at great prices.
There was a Happy Hour and the hostess and waitress were very pleasant and attentive.  I would highly recommend the Black Pearl!
